## TSBufferValidator.validateAndPrune() method

修剪 Object，移除 Schema 中未定义的 Key 需要确保 value 类型合法

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
validateAndPrune<T>(value: T, schemaOrId: string | TSBufferSchema): ValidatorOutput & {
        pruneOutput: T | undefined;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | value to be validated |
|  schemaOrId | string \| TSBufferSchema | Schema or schema ID. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ValidatorOutput](./tsbuffer-validator.validatoroutput.md) &amp; { pruneOutput: T \| undefined; }

Validate result and pruned value. if validate failed, `pruneOutput` would be undefined.
